subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Human Growth Hormone
Tennis
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Wayne Odesnik was suspended by the International Tennis Federation after pleading guilty to importing human growth hormone. Now back at Wimbledon, his fellow players haven’t exactly embraced him.
snippet: Wayne Odesnik was suspended by the International Tennis Federation after pleading guilty to importing human growth hormone. Now back at Wimbledon, his fellow players haven’t exactly embraced him.
